categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Bix Creo was an individual within the Jedi Order. Creo sported black facial hair and markings across their body. They wielded a single green lightsaber.

Bix Creo was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio in 2011. Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay and was subsequently published by GamesRadar in 2014. Lorca was created as one of several Jedi adversaries Maul's descendant would encounter throughout the game. Two other Jedi concepts were also created, Nexus Wan and Gareth Lorca.
